title: Do borders show in flex queue
body: I don't have a border in flex queue. Is this supposed to be or did I just not get my reward ?

replies.body: Those borders do not currently show, but that may change.  According to the [Preseason FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/231832207-Preseason-FAQ), it's slated to make an appearance depending on your border type and what you're queuing for.  Hope that helps!
